name: Station 59
description:
You wake up to the sound of the radio. 

For a second, you forget where you are. You dreamt about being lost in a vast and empty darkness, with only the sound of radio static guiding you towards... something. You imagine yourself outside, feeling the morning breeze against your face and hearing the birds chirp their morning song.

The voice from the radio brings you back to reality. You know that today will be like the others, that in a moment you will be seated at your desk and following the instructions. You will do this because there's nothing else to do—because it's the only thing you can do.

Station 59 is a single-player narrative experience about the monotony of a life in isolation, and an outside force which threatens to cause change. It will take between 25-45 minutes to complete, and is intended to be played in one sitting.

Controls:

WASD - move

Left click - interact

E - leave the desk

ENTER - stop typing

Originally conceived for Scream Jam 2021. Inspired by analog horror.
